meanings.definition: Not relating to the sounds of speech.
meanings.sent1: The nonphonemic symbols in the writing system do not represent speech sounds.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained that the nonphonemic aspects of the language were important for understanding.
meanings.sent3: The nonphonemic characters in the storybook seemed to have their own secret language.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonphonemic gesture, conveying warmth without words.
meanings.sent5: The nonphonemic details of the painting added depth to its meaning.

meanings.definition: Not affecting the distinctive sound of a word.
meanings.sent1: The nonphonemic changes in spelling did not alter the word's pronunciation.
meanings.sent2: He learned that the nonphonemic variations in accents could be intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The nonphonemic adjustments to the recipe didn't change the taste at all.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like a nonphonemic element, subtly influencing the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The nonphonemic details of the design added a unique touch to the product.
